name: Tuna Kush
description: Tuna Kush is a BC legend that is now surfacing in North American medical cannabis markets. This strain has been deemed one of the most potent available, producing small, dense nuggets that are hard-caked with resin. Although Tuna Kush is not known for its large yield, what does come off these thinner stalks will be rich with potency and flavor. That being said, if this strain makes it to your grow, upgrade your carbon filtersÂ because this bud is stinky! Expect notes of pungent skunk, fuel, and a delicate sweetness intermixed.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Uplifted, Sleepy, Happy, Euphoric, Stress, Depression, Insomnia, Lack of Appetite, Fatigue, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Paranoid, Headache
